description: Create and edit email templates for User Registration, User Invite, Password Reset, and your custom email services.

recipient.label: Recipient
recipient.tooltip: Enter recipient address. Enter multiple addresses separated by comma.

cc.label: CC
cc.tooltip: Enter cc address. Enter multiple addresses separated by comma

bcc.label: BCC
bcc.tooltip: Enter bcc address. Enter multiple addresses separated by comma.

attachment.label: Attachment
attachment.tooltip: You can enter URL for attachment. Enter multiple URLs separated by comma. You can use lookup keys here too. Example: {key1},{key2}.
